caves.name: Crumbly Cave
caves.description:
This cave is located in
the nearby woods. The
entrance is often buried
under a pile of rocks.
The villagers themselves
even don't know where this
is coming from. Due to the
lack of name ideas - It is
now called 'Crumbly Cave'.

caves.name: Darkend Lair
caves.description: This lair is found in the ruins of an old castle. It once served as an hiding space for many bandits and culpits.

caves.name: Swampy Grot
caves.description:
Swampy area with a lot
of slimes. They like
water... propably

caves.name: Hellish Hole
caves.description:
Welcome to Hell...
Or maybe it is just a
Cave with interesting red
mushrooms. Who knows?
